title: Fayette county 3 bedrooms 2.5 bath home for Rent
map_address: morning creek court near simpson rd
posting_body: You will love making this charming 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathroom house your new home!

Stay warm in the grand family room with a fireplace, or cook up your favorite meals in the spacious kitchen that has beautiful new flooring, plenty of cabinets and countertop space, a breakfast area with bay windows overlooking the back deck and huge back yard with beautiful foliage.

Other features include a separate dining room, new flooring, new carpet, fresh paint, covered front porch, huge master closet, huge master bathroom with bathtub and shower, big rooms, central HVAC and programmable thermostat, 2-car garage, nice level 1-acre lot with extended back deck, which is great for outdoor activities and entertainment.
Cul-de-sac, very quiet neighborhood with no through-traffic, just minutes from Hwy 54, Hwy 85 and the Fayette Pavilion.
You can start the new school year in your new home.
Get your kids into highly sought after Fayette County schools!!!
Landlord will clean out gutters and paint the back deck.
Text (Preferred)/Call today to schedule a showing.
